java/liquibase/database/sql/CreateIndexStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 
00009 import java.util.Arrays;
00010 import java.util.Iterator;
00011 
00012 public class CreateIndexStatement implements SqlStatement {
00013 
00014     private String tableSchemaName;
00015     private String indexName;
00016     private String tableName;
00017     private String[] columns;
00018     private String tablespace;
00019     private Boolean unique;
00020 
00021     public CreateIndexStatement(String indexName, String tableSchemaName, String tableName, Boolean isUnique, String... columns) {
00022         this.indexName = indexName;
00023         this.tableSchemaName = tableSchemaName;
00024         this.tableName = tableName;
00025         this.columns = columns;
00026         this.unique = isUnique;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getTableSchemaName() {
00030         return tableSchemaName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getIndexName() {
00034         return indexName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public String getTableName() {
00038         return tableName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String[] getColumns() {
00042         return columns;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getTablespace() {
00046         return tablespace;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public CreateIndexStatement setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00050         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00051 
00052         return this;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00056         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00057 
00058         buffer.append("CREATE ");
00059         if (unique != null && unique) {
00060             buffer.append("UNIQUE ");
00061         }            
00062         buffer.append("INDEX ");
00063 
00064         buffer.append(getIndexName()).append(" ON ");
00065         buffer.append(database.escapeTableName(getTableSchemaName(), getTableName())).append("(");
00066         Iterator<String> iterator = Arrays.asList(getColumns()).iterator();
00067         while (iterator.hasNext()) {
00068             String column = iterator.next();
00069             buffer.append(database.escapeColumnName(getTableSchemaName(), getTableName(), column));
00070             if (iterator.hasNext()) {
00071                 buffer.append(", ");
00072             }
00073         }
00074         buffer.append(")");
00075 
00076         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00077             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00078                 buffer.append(" ON ").append(getTablespace());
00079             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00080                 buffer.append(" IN ").append(getTablespace());
00081             } else {
00082                 buffer.append(" TABLESPACE ").append(getTablespace());
00083             }
00084         }
00085 
00086         return buffer.toString();
00087     }
00088 
00089     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00090         return ";";
00091     }
00092 
00093     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00094         return true;
00095     }
00096 }
